Standard_Text: Identify professions in or related to the visual arts and some of the specific skills needed for those professions.
Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Standard_Text: Careers and Career-Related Skills
Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Standard_Text: Examine art, photography, and other two- and three-dimensional images, comparing how different visual representations of the same object lead to different interpretations of its meaning, and describe or illustrate the results.

Standard_Text: Visual Literacy
Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Standard_Text: Use various drawing skills and techniques to depict lifestyles and scenes from selected civilizations.

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Standard_Text: Develop and apply specific and appropriate criteria individually or in groups to assess and critique works of art.
Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Standard_Text: Aesthetic Valuing - Responding to, Analyzing, and Making Judgments About Works in the Visual Arts

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)

Standard_Text: Analyze Art Elements and Principles of Design
Subject: Visual & Performing Arts (2001-2019)
